sentence.Network_en: Let me schematically show what happens.
sentence.Network_cn: 我来简要介绍一下发生的事情。

sentence.Network_en: Figure 72 shows schematically one possible situation.
sentence.Network_cn: 图72示意地表明一种可能的情况.

sentence.Network_en: This can be represented schematically by a series of springs and parallel dashpots.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种模拟可以粗略地用一组弹簧和并联的缓冲器来表示.

entry.def: A schematic diagram or picture shows something in a simple way.

example.ex: This is represented in the schematic diagram below.
example.tran: 这正如下面的这幅简略图所示。

example.ex: ...a schematic picture of the solar system.

auth_sentence.content: Here the outer margins of the striped card are shown schematically to make it clear what is going on behind the aperture.
auth_sentence.res_content: Here the outer margins of the striped card are shown schematically to make it clear what is going on behind the aperture.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Here the outer margins of the striped card are shown schematically to make it clear what is going on behind the aperture.

auth_sentence.content: Schematically it made scant sense; if she did not find it, there would be no drama.
